name: Yuukyuu Gensoukyoku
overview: Yukyu Gensokyouku is a simulation rpg game that features a data books (that contains all the game characters profiles). The game features different characters for the player to choose one and provide him with a name. During the game the player can choose different jobs or fights for all their group players to do and earn money. The characters stats will increase or decrease depending of that choices. One of the game jobs includes being a gladiator in an arena and win fights in a third person perspective to earn the money. The game most of the time is choose between different actions or answers to advance in one direction or another. That adventure part is made in a first person perspective. After choosing what the characters are going to do they will be shown walking around the town of Enfield in a third person perspective.
